name: Kalifa
text: On Play: Draw 2 cards, and trash 2 cards from your hand. Then, give up to 1 of your opponent's Characters -2 to their cost during this turn.

effect.text: Draw 2 cards, and trash 2 cards from your hand. Then, give up to 1 of your opponent's Characters -2 to their cost during this turn.

meta.notes: Rarity is 'C' as printed in the bottom right corner. The card is a sample, but all fields are filled based on visible text.
